# Repository Description

**Short Description (for GitHub About section):**
```
Policy-as-Code framework for automated compliance verification across 8+ countries. Reduces manual review time by 99.9% for global OTT platforms. Real-time regulatory monitoring with AI-powered policy updates.
```

**Use Cases:**
- Global OTT platforms (Netflix, Disney+, etc.)
- International gaming companies
- Multi-regional e-commerce platforms
- Cross-border fintech services
- Global social media platforms

**Technical Highlights:**
- Declarative YAML-based policy database
- Python 3.8+ compliance engine
- RESTful API with Swagger documentation
- Real-time regulatory source monitoring
- Multi-channel alerting (Email, Slack, Discord)
- JSON/HTML compliance reports
- Docker containerization ready
